name: Knytt Stories
summary: Knytt Stories, features Juni, a character who shows up commonly in Knytt myths and stories. In the game, the player acts out these stories (also called levels or worlds) as Juni. The two stories that comes bundled with the game, \"Tutorial - Learn How to Play Knytt Stories\" and \"The Machine - A Save-the-World Adventure,\" are fairly short, but the game comes with a full level editor and support for many extra levels in game, loaded from .knytt.bin files.
